attributes.action: Abolish the punative VAT on non-EU imported goods for private individuals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If a private individual makes a purchase from a country outside of the European Union you will have to pay VAT on anything that is valued over £18.00 plus a Royal Mail handling fee. This is a anti-competition measure by the EU and 'punishing' individuals for trying to get 'value for money' or simply wishing to purchase something that is either cheaper or not available locally
